Question.Subject: on craigslist and some other sites people asking for credit card#to verify identity?
Question.Content: is this a scam?they most say free but then say 2-3 $ or 30$ a month to verify age or identity plus different emails w/same pic (i even got one of my own posts with a pic of someone else diff/email talking about spam but saying their real using my (i am real sick of spam tactics) will they rip me off
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hi suhpisis,
When ever you are entering your credit card nformation online, check that there is a lock symbol on the right bottom of your browser and also the website address starts with https://........ instead of normal http://www.....
Then you can trust these websites and make any transaction.

Answer.Content:
